amendment.description: To require a plans on the implementation and utilization of flexible personnel management authorities in Department of Defense laboratories.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3342 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3342 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S7272-7273) To require a plans on the implementation and utilization of flexible personnel management authorities in Department of Defense laboratories.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3342 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3342 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid.
